p: The α-amylase-inhibitory activity varied among the tested plant extracts, but all of them demonstrated a significant dose-dependent reduction effect on the α-amylase enzyme. The most potent inhibitions appeared to correlate with the extracts of Camellia sinensis, Trigonella foenum-graecum and Urtica dioica leaves, and of Trigonella foenum-graecum seeds [ 162].
